subject: RE: [junit] Essay: The Trouble With JUnit
msgSnippet: Yes, that would help a great deal. ________________________________ From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of J. B. Rainsberger
messageBody:
Yes, that would help a great deal.

From: junit@yahoogroups.com [mailto:junit@yahoogroups.com] On Behalf Of
J. B. Rainsberger
Sent: Friday, November 24, 2006 1:02 PM
To: junit@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [junit] Essay: The Trouble With JUnit



What if I told you that someone was working on a book that teaches
object-oriented design /entirely/ through test-driven development? What
if I told you that such a book would likely have a Java version? Might
that help?
